agents.name: database_ping
agents.discription: Can ping the database and determine if the database connection is working

agents.name: database_connections
agents.discription: Checks the number of connections to the database and tell us if the health of the databse connections

agents.name: error_count
agents.discription: Checks the application log for errors and reports the health of applucation based on errors

agents.name: frequent_error
agents.discription: Checks the most frequent error from application logs

agents.name: queue_load
agents.discription: Checks the load on the queue and reports the health status

agents.name: queue_response_time
agents.discription: Checks the response time of the queue and reports the health status
